channel.title: DeviousPk - A Pking server from a pker's mentality
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][img]http://www.pictureshack.us/images/68889_deviouspk_banner.gif[/img]
[url=http://deviouspk.com][img]http://deviouspk.com/ipb/public/style_images/4_deviouspkl.png[/img][/url] [b][SIZE=5][FONT=Courier New]Features[/FONT][/b] [/SIZE] [B]Instant and active PKing Perfect Combat with correct specials Lag-free 24/7 Help Smooth and frequent updates Skilling PvM - Corporeal Beast, StrykeWyrmes, Slayer Tasks, Tormented Demons, KBD etc... Half Spawn Honor Points Pk Rating[/B]
[spoiler=Client] [B]Instant and quick updating[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uuHIUpj.png[/img]
[B][B]Easy switching between client tabs, avoid cramping up your computer![/B][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TbSkIdy.png[/img]
[B]Resizable Experience[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2tLm4Fr.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler=CONVENIENCE] [B]Instant Sets[/B] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1b1c25070bae7a7cdb90ad3de7ebecdb.gif[/img]
[B]Keyword spawning & Item searching[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SRqBxxt.png[/img]
[B][B]Play with friends[/B][/B] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/18ead0774c4e010023fde97f27f49ec2.gif[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Summoning] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f199fd92152b7a5a0b228217b9bef738.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b90a47cc052e6cf5d860d9114b8284d2.gif[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Misc] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/cf728adfeb0639af2f6226b106389fe0.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3JBPCmg.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Core] Multi-threaded cache downloading and client updating hosted from a separate dedicated server Hosted on a powerful DDoS protected dedicated server Properly synchronized packet sharing between server & client to ensure smooth gameplay[/spoiler]
...and much much more! Start your adventure today at [url=http://deviouspk.com]DeviousPk - #1 Spawn Server[/url] [/CENTER][/CENTER]
